event: Started B.Tech in Computer Science at Graphic Era University, Dehradun.
Won 2nd place in NSO Science Olympiad and played as Sports Captain in inter-college tournaments.
Completed major academic projects including Car Rental Management System and Data Aggregation in Wireless Sensor Networks.
Interned at GlobalLogic as Associate Analyst, focusing on machine learning and optimization.
Graduated with a B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering.
Joined LTIMindtree as Software Engineer, working on enterprise web applications.
Published research on Privacy Preserving Data Aggregation Techniques in IJCRT.
Recognized as Oracle Certified Java SE 11 Professional.
